the process of putting people or things into categories (= groups with the same features): You can upload your photos and assign them keywords for quick categorization. California defies categorization (= it is hard to put into a category). See
categorize
More examplesFewer examplesthe categorization of everyday objects such as cups and glassesThe categorization of library staff into specialist areas has had the result of cutting off most librarians from contact with readers.No one has come up with a satisfactory categorization scheme for odours.
